## VisibleTileSet.setNumberOfVisibleTiles() method

Sets maximum number of visible tiles.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  size | number | size of visible tiles array |
